Sentencas: A novel NiMo-yttira-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) catalyst-layer supported tubular single cell is developed for solid oxide fuel cells running on methane.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: NiMo nano particles are incorporated into the porous YSZ support as the reforming layer.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: The reforming performance of the NiMo-YSZ layer is investigated with respect to the NiMo loading and the optimum NiMo amount is found to be 6-8 wt% in the layer.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the methane conversion reaches 90%, and the H2 and CO yield could achieve 85% and 40%, respectively.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: This catalyst layer is integrated as the supporting layer in a tubular single cell for the dual functionality of stable mechanical support and high catalytic reforming activity.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: The internal reforming property of the NiMo-YSZ support and the electrochemical performance of the single cell are investigated with respect to the O2/C ratio in CH4/Air at 750 degrees C, and the optimum O2/C is determined to be 0.4.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: The single cell presents a maximum power density of 354 mW cm-2 and good performance stability during 50 h operation in CH4/Air.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane

Sentencas: The excellent electrochemical performance demonstrates the advantages of the new catalyst-layer supported single cell for direct operation in CH4/Air.
Titulo: Catalyst layer supported solid oxide fuel cells running on methane
